synonyms.synonym: 59 kDa dystrophin-associated protein A1 basic component 2

protein.specific_function: Adapter protein that binds to and probably organizes the subcellular localization of a variety of membrane proteins. May link various receptors to the actin cytoskeleton and the dystrophin glycoprotein complex. May play a role in the regulation of secretory granules via its interaction with PTPRN
